creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
description: squares set into ever increasingly larger squares, some hand embroidered and some machine embroidered; pink, green and blue; some gold threads; geometric and floral patterns; blue corduroy borders; ties on upper right and left; blue lining
title: Baby Carrier
